archimate:DataObject.name: Credential Exchange Layer Roles
archimate:DataObject.documentation: The business roles defined at the Credential Exchange layer of Sovrin Infrastructure. These include Subject, Issuer, Holder/Prover, Verifier, and Insurer. See Appendix G.
